languages.text: "Лорд-инквизитор особо настаивал на том, чтобы я освоил дисциплину святой демонологии. Я использую свою веру и силу для уничтожения врагов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} — слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g} дрожат при звуке имени Императора, произнесенным моими устами. Я также обладаю навыками биоманта, управляющего телесными процессами. Иногда... иногда я прибегаю к ним в своей работе. Когда необходимо сделать дознаваемого сговорчивее".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-инквизитор особо настаивал на том, чтобы я освоил дисциплину святой демонологии. Я использую свою веру и силу для уничтожения врагов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} — слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g} дрожат при звуке имени Императора, произнесенным моими устами. Я также обладаю навыками биоманта, управляющего телесными процессами. Иногда... иногда я прибегаю к ним в своей работе. Когда необходимо сделать дознаваемого сговорчивее".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-инквизитор особо настаивал на том, чтобы я освоил дисциплину святой демонологии. Я использую свою веру и силу для уничтожения врагов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} — слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g} дрожат при звуке имени Императора, произнесенным моими устами. Я также обладаю навыками биоманта, управляющего телесными процессами. Иногда... иногда я прибегаю к ним в своей работе. Когда необходимо сделать дознаваемого сговорчивее".

traits.locale_text: "I use my faith and my power to defend the Imperium against its enemies — Chaos, xenos, and other threats tremble at the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master this discipline. Truly, we agents of the Golden Throne must guard our body and soul against corruption with particular fervor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the Imperium — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

languages.text: “大审判官大人坚持要我掌握制裁恶魔的力量。我会通过我的信仰与力量，粉碎{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的敌人。只要我的口中道出帝皇的圣名，{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的仆从就会瑟瑟发抖。此外，我还是一位熟练的生物系灵能者，我可以操纵身体的运行。有的时候……有必要的情况下，我会在工作的过程中运用这些能力，确保我的审讯对象更愿意合作。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

traits.locale_text: “审判长大人坚持要我掌握制裁恶魔的力量。我会通过我的信仰与力量，粉碎{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的敌人。只要我的口中道出帝皇的圣名，{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的仆从就会瑟瑟发抖。此外，我还是一位熟练的生物系灵能者，我可以操纵身体的运行。有的时候……有必要的情况下，我会在工作的过程中运用这些能力，确保我的审讯对象更愿意合作。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the Imperium — servants of Chaos tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

languages.text: «El Lord Inquisidor insistió con firmeza en que dominara la disciplina de la Daemonología Santa. Utilizo mi fe y mi poder para aplastar a los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}: los siervos del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g} tiemblan al oír el nombre del Emperador cuando lo pronuncian mis labios. También tengo talento como biomante; puedo manipular los procesos corporales. A veces... a veces recurro a esas habilidades en el desempeño de mi trabajo. Cuando es necesario motivar a un interrogado para que coopere».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

traits.locale_text: «El Lord Inquisidor insistió con firmeza en que dominara la disciplina de la Daemonología Santa. Utilizo mi fe y mi poder para aplastar a los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}: los siervos del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g} tiemblan al oír el nombre del Emperador cuando lo pronuncian mis labios. También tengo talento como biomante; puedo manipular los procesos corporales. A veces... a veces recurro a esas habilidades en el desempeño de mi trabajo. Cuando es necesario motivar a un interrogado para que coopere».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターは、私が聖別悪魔学を習得することを最も強く望んだ。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵を打ち砕くために、自分の信仰と力を使っている。私の口から発せられる皇帝の名の響きに、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}のしもべたちは震え上がるのだ。私はまた、熟練したバイオマンサーでもある。つまり、身体的なプロセスを操作できるということだ。時には…時には、仕事の過程でその技術に頼ることもある。尋問の対象をより協力的にする必要があるときにな」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターは、私が聖別悪魔学を習得することを最も強く望んだ。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵を打ち砕くために、自分の信仰と力を使っている。私の口から発せられる皇帝の名の響きに、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}のしもべたちは震え上がるのだ。私はまた、熟練したバイオマンサーでもある。つまり、身体的なプロセスを操作できるということだ。時には…時には、仕事の過程でその技術に頼ることもある。尋問の対象をより協力的にする必要があるときにな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der Großinquisitor hat seiner Wartung Ausdruck verliehen, dass ich die Disziplin der Erhabenen Dämonologie erlerne. Unmissverständlich. Ich setze meinen Glauben und meine Kraft ein, um die Feinde des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu vernichten. Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} erzittern, wenn der Name des Imperators über meine Lippen gleitet. Ich bin auch geschult in der Biomantie — ich kann körperliche Prozesse manipulieren. Manchmal ... manchmal nutze ich diese Fähigkeiten für meine Arbeit. Wenn es nötig ist, kann man damit im Verhör für mehr Kooperationsbereitschaft sorgen."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

traits.locale_text: "Der Großinquisitor hat seiner Wartung Ausdruck verliehen, dass ich die Disziplin der Erhabenen Dämonologie erlerne. Unmissverständlich. Ich setze meinen Glauben und meine Kraft ein, um die Feinde des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu vernichten. Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} erzittern, wenn der Name des Imperators über meine Lippen gleitet. Ich bin auch geschult in der Biomantie — ich kann körperliche Prozesse manipulieren. Manchmal ... manchmal nutze ich diese Fähigkeiten für meine Arbeit. Wenn es nötig ist, kann man damit im Verhör für mehr Kooperationsbereitschaft sorgen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur a insisté pour que j'apprenne à maîtriser la démonologie séraphique. Ma foi et mes pouvoirs me permettent donc d'écraser les ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, et les serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremblent lorsque je prononce le nom de l'Empereur. Je suis également un biomancien de talent, ce qui signifie que je peux manipuler les processus corporels. Il m'arrive parfois d'avoir recourt à cette capacité dans le cadre de mon travail, notamment lorsqu'un prisonnier se montre peu coopératif au cours d'un interrogatoire. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur a insisté pour que j'apprenne à maîtriser la démonologie séraphique. Ma foi et mes pouvoirs me permettent donc d'écraser les ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, et les serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremblent lorsque je prononce le nom de l'Empereur. Je suis également un biomancien de talent, ce qui signifie que je peux manipuler les processus corporels. Il m'arrive parfois d'avoir recourt à cette capacité dans le cadre de mon travail, notamment lorsqu'un prisonnier se montre peu coopératif au cours d'un interrogatoire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu, Kutsi İblisbilim'de ustalaşayım diye çok diretti. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} düşmanlarını inancımla, kuvvetimle eziyorum. İmparator'un adıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} hizmetkârlarını perişan ediyorum. Biyobazlıktan da iyi anlarım. Vücut işleyişine hükmedebilirim. Bazen... Bazen iş sırasında böyle güçlere başvurmak icap edebiliyor. Sorguladığım birini yola getirirken misal."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor was most insistent that I master the discipline of Sanctic Daemonology. I use my faith and my power to crush the enemies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} — servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} tremble at the sound of the Emperor's name, uttered by my lips. I am also a skilled biomancer — I can manipulate bodily processes. Sometimes... sometimes I resort to those skills in the course of my work. When it is necessary to make the subject of an interrogation more cooperative."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu, Kutsi İblis Bilimi'nde ustalaşayım diye çok diretti. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} düşmanlarını inancımla, kuvvetimle eziyorum. İmparator'un adıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} hizmetkârlarını perişan ediyorum. Biyobazlıktan da iyi anlarım. Vücut işleyişine hükmedebilirim. Bazen... Bazen iş sırasında böyle güçlere başvurmak icap edebiliyor. Sorguladığım birini yola getirirken misal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
